title: Sylvanian Families
synopsis: Enter the world of the Sylvanians, a community of tiny anthropomorphized animals who have the same difficulties that people do. But the Sylvanians are often able to work through those dilemmas, teaching the children who join them valuable life lessons.
related_anime: ['Sylvanian Families Mini Gekijou: Omoigakenai Okyakusama', 'Sylvanian Families: Mini Story']
